author: Farnaz Fassihi
title: Chemical Attacks Persist as 2013 Syrian Chemical-Weapons Deal Fails
text:
UNITED NATIONSâ€”The apparent chemical attack that killed dozens of people and injured hundreds more in Syria on Saturday again exposed the failure of international efforts to investigate and hold accountable those responsible for chemical-weapons violations in Syria, despite repeated pledges to do so.
The U.N. Security Council held an emergency meeting on Monday afternoon at which the U.S. and its allies blamed Russia for preventing the Council from addressing the alleged use of chlorine and nerve gas against civilians in Syria....
